assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Host Hotels & Resorts, Inc. is an S&P 500 company and is the largest lodging real estate investment trust and one of the largest owners of luxury and upper-upscale hotels. The Company currently owns 72 properties in the United States and five properties internationally totaling approximately 41,900 rooms. The Company also holds non-controlling interests in seven domestic and one international joint ventures. Guided by a disciplined approach to capital allocation and aggressive asset management, the Company partners with premium brands such as Marriott, Ritz-Carlton, Westin, Sheraton, W, St. Regis, The Luxury Collection, Hyatt, Fairmont, Hilton, Four Seasons, Swissôtel, ibis and Novotel, as well as independent brands.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Michael E. Lentz
companyOfficers.title: Exec. VP of Devel., Design & Construction

companyOfficers.name: Jeffrey S. Clark
companyOfficers.title: Sr. VP of Global Tax & Risk Management

ownershipList.organization: Vanguard Total Stock Market Index Fund
Cohen & Steers Institutional Realty Shares Incorporated
